turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place a drink order to my local Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What is the location of the store you'd like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order from the Starbucks in the Southland Plaza Shopping Center

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, and what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order the Cafe Americano

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like the grande

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any milk added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else added to your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a Caffe Americano, grande, with whipped cream and whole milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed at the Starbucks in Southland Plaza. Your order will be ready for pickup soon and details have been sent to your mobile device as a text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Enjoy!
